General.Name: Shen Zhen Bauing Construction Holding Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Bauing Construction Holding Group Co., Ltd. operates as an integrated design company in China. The company offers architectural design services, such as urban design, site design, landscape design, building structure design, building physical design, construction equipment design, space planning and design, interior decoration design, art design, security design, parking management design, lightening design, logo design, etc.; building construction services; and e-commerce platform services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
